lead_paragraph: Ernie Els withdrew from the Deutsche Bank Championship yesterday for family reasons. Els, who is ranked fourth in the world, is returning to his home near London, where his children will be preparing to return to school, Els said in a statement.Els plans to return next week for the third event of the FedEx Cup, the BMW Championship in Lemont, Ill., and will play in the Tour Championship in Atlanta the following week.Els finished fourth Sunday in the first of the four FedEx Cup playoff events, the Barclays Classic in Harrison, N.Y.
